sentences.sCn: 顺便问一下，你在哪儿出生的？

sentences.sContent: The wine, incidentally, goes very well with a mature cheese.
sentences.sCn: 顺便说一下，这种葡萄酒配熟干酪味道很好。

words.tran: [光] 入射的；附带的；易发生的，伴随而来的
附带的；偶然的；容易发生的
附带事件；偶然事件；杂项

trans.tranOther: used to add more information to what you have just said, or to introduce a new subject that you have just thought of
